meanings.definition: To be extremely and uncritically fond of
meanings.sent1: She dotes on her pet cat, always showering it with love and attention.
meanings.sent2: The grandmother dotes on her grandchildren, spoiling them with treats and toys.
meanings.sent3: He dotes on his lucky socks, believing they bring him good fortune.
meanings.sent4: The artist dotes on his paintbrushes, treating them with utmost care and respect.
meanings.sent5: The teacher dotes on her students, always encouraging them to do their best.

meanings.definition: To show excessive affection or love
meanings.sent1: The puppy dotes on its owner, wagging its tail excitedly whenever they come home.
meanings.sent2: She dotes on her partner, constantly showering them with hugs and kisses.
meanings.sent3: The child dotes on their favorite toy, carrying it everywhere they go.
meanings.sent4: The sun dotes on the flowers, giving them warmth and light to grow.
meanings.sent5: The fan dotes on their favorite celebrity, collecting all their memorabilia.

meanings.definition: To be foolishly or excessively fond of
meanings.sent1: He dotes on his car, spending all his money on unnecessary upgrades.
meanings.sent2: She dotes on her phone, constantly checking it even during meals.
meanings.sent3: The child dotes on candy, always sneaking extra pieces when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: The cat dotes on its toy mouse, pouncing on it playfully all day long.
meanings.sent5: The student dotes on procrastination, delaying their assignments until the last minute.
